name: FC - S - Brick Works
Preinstall checks
Area accessible, substrate acceptable & approval to start works - Consider services, cavity & waterproofing requirements prior to install
Ground clearance correct to specification
Grids/Wall marked for reference. RL reference/TOW confirmed. Base/Concrete/footing clean, tidy and level ready for first coarse.
Brick installation
Base of wall starting correct location - Brick base overhang within tolerances (no more than 20mm)
Control joints installed correctly
Weep holes installed correctly - Consider setout & size
Mortar Joints installed within tolerances (7-13mm)
Wall ties installed and aligning with specification (spacing, spans, length etc)
Horizontal shelf angles & lintel bars installed and correctly fixed where required - Consider horizontal and vertical alignment
All relevant flashings and waterproofing/taping completed as required - If Applicable
Caulking completed (correct colour) and satisfactory finish achieved
Brick cavity is correctly formed and free of obstructions
Brickwork completed to required specification. All brickwork washed/clean & area left clean & tidy - Wall built within tolerance - straight, level and to the correct height and colour
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
CST - S - Completion Documents
All relevant Compliance Documentation completed and attached above
Any Additional Compliance Documentation (Required under Section C and by Consultants) - Completed and Attached
Do not select "Pass" HERE until all requirements have been marked as "Yes" & attached or you have selected "N/A"
Request Signoff
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
ST - S - Blockwork
Grids available for reference and base of wall marked accurately, RL reference/top of wall (TOW) confirmed
Base of wall in correct location
Horizontal reinforcing installed correctly (centres/ size / splicing etc)
Ties / Control joints installed as required
Vertical reinforcing installed as required with appropriate splice
Openings checked and correct - location, height and width
Washouts correct/openings covered correctly and wall braced adequately (if required)
Wall built within tolerance - straight, level and to the correct height (Approval to pour)
Concrete specifications checked and correct
All blocks filled to correct height
Starter bars in centre of block if applicable
Blockwork wall(s) complete to required specification
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
Completion documents
Product Warranty Attached
Thickness Test Conducted, passed and results attached
PS3 Attached
